languages.text: "Ваша Светлость, позвольте побеспокоить. Рад уведомить, что абордажная команда уже спешит преподнести династии редчайший и ценнейший дар. В трюме корабля еретики хранили кое-что, представляющее особую ценность. Наши технопровидцы провели все очищающие ритуалы, и теперь он ваш!"
languages.translation_comment:
Фактотум
Выдается награда для корабля за Абордаж

Фактотум
Выдается награда для корабля за Абордаж

languages.text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, if you would permit me to interrupt: I am pleased to inform you that the boarding team has presented a most extraordinary gift to your dynasty. The heretics were keeping something of rare value in their hold. Our Enginseers have completed all the necessary rituals of cleansing. This trophy is now all yours!"
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость, позвольте побеспокоить. Рад уведомить, что абордажная команда уже спешит преподнести династии редчайший и ценнейший дар. В трюме корабля еретики хранили кое-что, представляющее особую ценность. Наши технопровидцы провели все очищающие ритуалы, и теперь он ваш!"

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, if you permit me to interrupt. I am pleased to inform you that the boarding team has presented a most extraordinary gift to the dynasty. The heretics were keeping something of rare value in their hold. Our Enginseers have completed all the necessary rituals of cleansing, and now this trophy is all yours!"

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, if you permit me to interrupt. I am pleased to inform you that the boarding team has presented a most extraordinary gift to the dynasty. The heretics were keeping something of rare value in their hold. Our Enginseers have completed all the necessary rituals of cleansing. This trophy is now all yours!"

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, if you would permit me to interrupt: I am pleased to inform you that the boarding team has presented a most extraordinary gift to your dynasty. The heretics were keeping something of rare value in their hold. Our Enginseers have completed all the necessary rituals of cleansing. This trophy is now all yours!"

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, if you would permit me to interrupt: I am pleased to inform you that the boarding team has presented a most extraordinary gift to your dynasty. The heretics were keeping something of rare value in their hold. Our Enginseers have completed all the necessary rituals of cleansing. This trophy is now all yours!"

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, if you would permit me to interrupt: I am pleased to inform you that the boarding team has presented a most extraordinary gift to your dynasty. The heretics were keeping something of rare value in their hold. Our Enginseers have completed all the necessary rituals of cleansing. This trophy is now all yours!"

languages.text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, si me permite la interrupción, me complace informar de que el equipo de abordaje ha ofrecido un regalo de lo más extraordinario a su dinastía. Los herejes guardaban algo de gran valor en la bodega, y nuestros visioingenieros han completado todos los rituales de purificación necesarios. ¡Este trofeo es ahora suyo!».
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, if you would permit me to interrupt: I am pleased to inform you that the boarding team has presented a most extraordinary gift to your dynasty. The heretics were keeping something of rare value in their hold. Our Enginseers have completed all the necessary rituals of cleansing. This trophy is now all yours!"

traits.locale_text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, si me permite la interrupción, me complace informar de que el equipo de abordaje ha ofrecido un regalo de lo más extraordinario a su dinastía. Los herejes guardaban algo de gran valor en la bodega, y nuestros visioingenieros han completado todos los rituales de purificación necesarios. ¡Este trofeo es ahora suyo!».

languages.text: “舰长大人，请原谅我打断您的谈话。我很高兴地通知您，登舰队为您的王朝带来了极其贵重的礼物。那些异端分子藏匿了许多贵重的东西。我们的引擎先知已经完成了必要的净化仪式，如今，那些战利品都是您的财产了！”
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, if you would permit me to interrupt: I am pleased to inform you that the boarding team has presented a most extraordinary gift to your dynasty. The heretics were keeping something of rare value in their hold. Our Enginseers have completed all the necessary rituals of cleansing. This trophy is now all yours!"

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，请原谅我打断您的谈话。我很高兴地通知您，登舰队为您的王朝带来了极其贵重的礼物。那些异端分子藏匿了许多贵重的东西。我们的引擎先知已经完成了必要的净化仪式，如今，那些战利品都是您的财产了！”

languages.text: « Si je peux me permettre de vous interrompre, Votre Seigneurie, j'ai le plaisir de vous annoncer que le groupe d'abordage a découvert une offrande extraordinaire pour votre dynastie. Les hérétiques conservaient dans leur cale un objet d'une rare valeur. Nos technaugures ont accompli tous les rituels de purification nécessaires. Ce magnifique trophée est tout à vous, à présent ! »
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, if you would permit me to interrupt: I am pleased to inform you that the boarding team has presented a most extraordinary gift to your dynasty. The heretics were keeping something of rare value in their hold. Our Enginseers have completed all the necessary rituals of cleansing. This trophy is now all yours!"

traits.locale_text: « Si je peux me permettre de vous interrompre, Votre Seigneurie, j'ai le plaisir de vous annoncer que le groupe d'abordage a découvert une offrande extraordinaire pour votre dynastie. Les hérétiques conservaient dans leur cale un objet d'une rare valeur. Nos technaugures ont accompli tous les rituels de purification nécessaires. Ce magnifique trophée est tout à vous, à présent ! »

languages.text: 「陛下、お邪魔をお許しください。乗船チームがあなたの王朝に最も特別な贈り物をしたことをお伝えできて光栄です。異端者たちは、彼らの貨物室に貴重な何かを持っていました。私たち機関整備師は浄化に必要なすべての儀式を完了しました。この戦利品はすべて、今あなたのものです！」
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, if you would permit me to interrupt: I am pleased to inform you that the boarding team has presented a most extraordinary gift to your dynasty. The heretics were keeping something of rare value in their hold. Our Enginseers have completed all the necessary rituals of cleansing. This trophy is now all yours!"

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、お邪魔をお許しください。乗船チームがあなたの王朝に最も特別な贈り物をしたことをお伝えできて光栄です。異端者たちは、彼らの貨物室に貴重な何かを持っていました。私たち機関整備師は浄化に必要なすべての儀式を完了しました。この戦利品はすべて、今あなたのものです！」

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, affınıza sığınarak sözünüzü kesiyorum. Bordalama ekibinin hanedanlığınıza oldukça sıra dışı bir armağan sunduğunu bildirmekten memnuniyet duyarım. Kâfirler, ambarlarında nadir bir şey saklıyormuş. Mühedyumlarımız gereklik tüm arınma ayinlerini tamamladı. Ganimet artık sizindir!"
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, if you would permit me to interrupt: I am pleased to inform you that the boarding team has presented a most extraordinary gift to your dynasty. The heretics were keeping something of rare value in their hold. Our Enginseers have completed all the necessary rituals of cleansing. This trophy is now all yours!"

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, affınıza sığınarak sözünüzü kesiyorum. Bordalama ekibinin hanedanlığınıza oldukça sıra dışı bir armağan sunduğunu bildirmekten memnuniyet duyarım. Kâfirler, ambarlarında nadir bir şey saklıyormuş. Mühedyumlarımız gereklik tüm arınma ayinlerini tamamladı. Ganimet artık sizindir!"

languages.text: "Bitte erlaubt mir, Euch zu unterbrechen, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft.} Ich freue mich, Euch mitteilen zu können, dass der Entertrupp Eurer Dynastie ein außergewöhnliches Geschenk machen möchte. Die Ketzer hatten einen ausgesprochen wertvollen Gegenstand in ihrem Besitz. Unsere Maschinenseher haben mittlerweile alle erforderlichen Reingigungsrituale abgeschlossen. Die Trophäe gehört nun Euch!"
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, if you would permit me to interrupt: I am pleased to inform you that the boarding team has presented a most extraordinary gift to your dynasty. The heretics were keeping something of rare value in their hold. Our Enginseers have completed all the necessary rituals of cleansing. This trophy is now all yours!"

traits.locale_text: "Bitte erlaubt mir, Euch zu unterbrechen, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft.} Ich freue mich, Euch mitteilen zu können, dass der Entertrupp Eurer Dynastie ein außergewöhnliches Geschenk machen möchte. Die Ketzer hatten einen ausgesprochen wertvollen Gegenstand in ihrem Besitz. Unsere Maschinenseher haben mittlerweile alle erforderlichen Reingigungsrituale abgeschlossen. Die Trophäe gehört nun Euch!"
